content: Hi, the CDISC EHR to CDASH group met today in a sunny, but freezing Silver Spring, MD. I briefed a number of people about the approach we were taking and impressed upon them the importance of developing a set of mappings to FHIR resources (from CDASH Data elements). I'm led to believe there is a group working on FHIR resources from BRIDG - anyone know anything about that?

There isn't a project scope statement for mapping BRIDG to FHIR that I've seen yet. It's possible some work is being performed by Mitra or by some members of the former BRIDG working group -- but haven't seen anything concrete.
Ok, thanks. Will continue to hang fire and wait
